sec.p: All data used in the analyses in this paper have been placed in the Dryad repository, DOI 10.5061/dryad.7sn14, with the exception of the productivity data, which are online at: Newell, M., Harris, M., Wanless, S., Burthe, S., Bogdanova, M., Gunn, C., and Daunt, F. ( 2012). The Isle of May Long-Term Study (IMLOTS) Seabird Annual Breeding Success 1982â€“2012. NERC Environmental Information Data Centre. doi: 10.5285/d38b609b-7bc1-4204-86dd-022375208d4f.
